name: Baldi's Basics in Funkin': Unused Ultimatum
name_original: Baldi's Basics in Funkin': Unused Ultimatum
description:
As soon as Boyfriend and Girlfriend finished viewing Baldi's school, they then decide to leave, but then get teleported to a secret part of the school where they meet a load of other characters hidden. Once beating those characters, they get sent to a new school in Plus. [Keep in mind, Classic and Plus are in different univereses and the Baldis in both of them aren't nice] Luckily, the other characters aren't evil in any way. Now Boyfriend and Girlfriend to leave the Plus school to escape.

Basically the Baldi's Basics in Funkin Definitive Edition

4 WEEKS

15+ SONGS

1 SECRET

COOL MECHANICS
